resources.string: Don\'t criticize what you can\'t understand.
And when the broken hearted people living in the world agree,there will be an answer, let it be.
Lose your dream, you lose your mind.
Now everyone dreams of a love faithful and true,but you and I know what this world can do.
Ah, but I was so much older then. Iâ€™m younger than that now
I\ve traveled each and every highway;And more, much more than this,I did it my way.
The life I walk eternally was all I knew nothing more held me here to this earth until you.
Don\'t know you super well. But I think that you might be the same as me, behave abnormally.
